data.value: Sign up for a healthy lifestyle

data.name: L3605
data.value: Enroll in our telephonic lifestyle health coaching program to be paired with a health coach who’ll help you make and sustain important lifestyle changes – to get healthier, stay healthier and feel better.

data.name: L3606
data.value: No matter what your goals are – losing weight and keeping it off, exercising more, quitting smoking, reducing your risk for a chronic medical condition, living healthier with a chronic medical condition – our lifestyle health coaching program can benefit you.

data.name: L3607
data.value: Our caring, dedicated health coaches are available to assist you in making the changes that are important to you at this time. They’ve worked with thousands of participants just like you. Our coaches listen to your needs, preferences and circumstances and help you develop a plan that is individualized for you. Your coach will hold you accountable for your actions and support you every step of the way to better health.

data.name: L3608
data.value: You must first complete a health risk assessment (HRA) before enrolling in a coached program. You may call us at 866-334-2137 if you have any questions or would like to enroll over the phone.

data.name: L3609
data.value: The INTERVENT program is proven to work. It’s safe and follows guidelines established by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

data.name: L3610
data.value: If you use tobacco and want to quit, participate in the free INTERVENT tobacco cessation program. You may also receive non-prescription nicotine replacement therapy and certain tobacco cessation medications covered at 100 percent. If you are not ready to quit, focusing on stress management, physical activity or healthy eating as part of coaching could be just the help you need to get closer to thinking seriously about giving up tobacco. And, by completing four coaching sessions over 12 weeks, and a subsequent session scheduled, the 2020 tobacco surcharge will be removed.

data.name: L3611
data.value: This version of our lifestyle management program is designed especially for people who desire to manage their own program. The self-help programs focus on a specific topic (for example, nutrition, exercise, weight management or stress management).

data.name: L3612
data.value: You will participate at your own pace via the Internet, so you will have the convenience of completing assessments and accessing and printing materials at times that work for you. While this program is not a quick solution, it’s a safe, proven way to help you get started toward achieving lasting results. And, you receive the same high quality educational materials and tools as our other scientifically proven programs.

data.name: L3628
data.value: INTERVENT’s caring, dedicated health coaches help identify resources to support the pregnancy and delivery of a healthy baby. After your baby is born, coaches help manage aspects of your lifestyle that are important during the post-partum period, such as getting back in shape, losing weight, managing stress and returning to work. Special educational modules are available for women who are interested in breastfeeding their baby.

data.value: The foods you eat, the stress you feel and the activities you do all affect your health. Now you can find out how by completing our health risk assessment (HRA).

data.name: L3647
data.value: The HRA is a free confidential online assessment that considers your lifestyle habits and health history to determine how healthy you are and whether you’re at risk for certain chronic diseases or illnesses. It only takes about 15 minutes to complete.

Plus, you’ll be able to take advantage of our lifestyle management programs where you can learn about how to eat more healthfully, manage your weight, reduce your stress level and much more.

data.name: L3834
data.value: The wellness assessment is a free confidential online assessment that considers your lifestyle habits and health history to determine how healthy you are and whether you’re at risk for certain chronic diseases or illnesses. It only takes about 15 minutes to complete.

data.name: L3835
data.value:
Keeping your regularly scheduled appointments with your health coach is important to your success in making and sustaining lifestyle changes. Your coach will listen to your needs, preferences and circumstances and help you stay on track to achieve your goals. He or she will be there to support you every step of the way to better health.

    What's Required
  • The number of coaching sessions that you may receive during a program year depends upon your responses to the wellness assessment and other factors. While you should aim to complete all coaching sessions for maximum benefit, you must complete about 75 percent of your sessions to earn this incentive.
  • Ask your health coach to tell you the specific number of sessions you must complete and the deadline for completing your sessions.

data.name: L3836
data.value: Your wellness assessment will be more accurate and complete if you know your health numbers – your blood pressure, fasting blood values, body weight and height. Knowing your numbers is an important step in understanding how to make smart decisions about your health. You can obtain your health numbers from your personal health care provider or from a local lab. Print the “Know Your Numbers” form from "My Program," fill in the numbers and provide the appropriate signature. Next, enter your health numbers into the Health Measurements section of your wellness assessment or provide them to your coach.

data.name: L3837
data.value:
Follow-up evaluations are important to you and to INTERVENT. Nothing motivates like success. Your follow-up survey is scheduled after about 12 weeks of participation in the coaching program. The follow-up questionnaire is similar to the wellness assessment that you completed at the beginning of your program – only shorter.

After completing your follow-up evaluation, you will receive a progress report that compares your baseline health numbers to your current values. Your report will also outline the topics that you have covered during your coaching sessions.

data.name: L3862
data.value:
If you have not had bloodwork completed in the last 60 days, or you don't have access to the results, we will organize an appointment for you to get your new results. Depending on your location, you will be offered either a home visit, or an appointment at a lab in your area. To get more accurate results you must fast before the appointment: Do not have anything to eat or drink including chewing gum (except plain water) for at least 12 hours before blood collection.

The following measurements are also required: weight, height and waist circumference. These mreasurements will be collected at the same time as your new bloodwork if you are having a home visit. If your bloodwork is being done at a laboratory, these measurements will be collected by your health coach during your first coaching call (you will weigh and measure yourself using a scale and measuring tape and your values will be verified by your coach via a photograph of the scale and measuring tape results, or a live interaction over secure videoconferencing).

data.name: L4003
data.value: Body mass index (BMI) is the most widely accepted method of assessing body weight. BMI describes relative weight for height. It is calculated as weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters: weight (kg)/[height (m2)]. A BMI less than 18.5 is considered underweight. A BMI of 18.5 to 24.9 is considered normal, while 25 to 29.9 is considered overweight. Obesity is classified as a BMI of 30.0 or greater.

Thank you for your time and interest in the Canadian Diabetes Prevention Program. Based on your responses, you are at a fairly low risk of having type 2 diabetes. However, based on your age and body mass index (calculated from your height and weight), you may be at risk for prediabetes and, therefore, you do qualify for this free program.


Many years before people develop type 2 diabetes, most of them develop prediabetes. This individualized coaching program can empower you to lead a healthier lifestyle, manage your weight and reduce your risk of developing prediabetes and type 2 diabetes.


Get Started Today
Step 1: Click the button below to create your profile
Step 2: A specialist will call you in the next two business days


Do not delay. Prediabetes and type 2 diabetes are serious chronic diseases.

data.value: Eligible plan members with diabetes may be coached by a Certified Diabetes Care and Education Specialist (CDCES) and receive a POGO Automatic® Blood Glucose Monitoring System at no cost.

data.name: L4409
data.value: POGO Automatic is the only FDA-cleared, One-Step™ blood glucose monitor with 10-test cartridge technology that does all the work of lancing and blood collection for you, ending the need for separate lancets and separate test strips.

data.name: L4410
data.value: The Patterns® for POGO Automatic app syncs with POGO Automatic and provides data that can help you track and manage blood glucose results. Plus, you can easily share and discuss your results with your INTERVENT health coach.

data.name: L4411
data.value: In addition to helping you lead a healthy lifestyle, your INTERVENT coach can also provide guidance on knowing how and when to test your blood glucose, interpreting your test results, taking diabetes medications, dealing with low and high blood glucose readings and avoiding or managing the long-term complications of diabetes.

data.name: L4541
data.value:
Notes: We have identified personalized goals for you based on expert preventive/chronic care management guidelines. Your action/care plan outlines your personal recommendations for achieving your individualized goals.* Please share all information with your personal doctors(s)/healthcare providers. If your doctor or another healthcare professional has provided recommendations different to those outlined here, please discuss this with him/her before implementing our recommendations.

*Parts of this report were automatically generated using health assessment and other available data together with expert preventive/chronic care management guidelines. It is intended as a starting point for participant-healthcare provider discussions and, where appropriate, should be revised based on participant/healthcare provider input, participant progress and multiple other factors.

data.name: L4549
data.value: A. Health Measurements and Lifestyle Risks

data.name: L4550
data.value:
Notes: Your personal action/care plan summarizes some of the key steps you should take to optimize your health and reduce your risk for/better manage chronic conditions. You are not expected to implement all the lifestyle recommendations at once. Your health coach will help you put into action the lifestyle recommendations in a step-by-step fashion at a pace that is most appropriate for you.
Our extensive experience shows you can markedly improve your health and well-being by following your personal action/care plan. Like all worthwhile things in life, making and adhering to lifestyle changes does take effort, but can be accomplished. We look forward to helping you reach your goals.

Keeping your regularly scheduled appointments with your health coach is important to your success in making and sustaining lifestyle changes. Your coach will listen to your needs, preferences and circumstances and help you stay on track to achieve your goals. He or she will be there to support you every step of the way to better health.

    What's Required
  • The number of coaching sessions that you may receive during a program year depends upon your responses to the wellness assessment and other factors. While you should aim to complete all coaching sessions for maximum benefit, you must complete at least four sessions to earn this incentive.
  • Once you have completed four coaching sessions, you will receive a $100 Amazon electronic gift card. Please ensure your email address in your profile is correct.

data.name: L4604
data.value: Specifically, via a Google API, we have integrated with services provided by Google Health Connect to provide insights and analysis of your health. To this end, please note that any collection, storage, use and/or transfer of your data that is received from:

data.name: L4605
data.value: a Google API will, at all times, adhere to Google API Services User Data Policy, including the limited use requirements prescribed therein; and

data.name: L4606
data.value: Google Health Connect will, at all times, adhere to the Health Connect Permissions Policy, including the limited use requirements prescribed therein.

data.name: L4607
data.value: To summarize, INTERVENT's use and transfer to any other app any information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the concerned Limited Use requirements.
